scripts.file-events-test-synth: tsc && cdk synth FileEventPublisherTestStack -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts src/cdk/testApp.ts"
scripts.file-events-test-deploy: tsc && cdk deploy FileEventPublisherTestStack -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts src/cdk/testApp.ts"
scripts.file-events-test-destroy: tsc && cdk destroy FileEventPublisherTestStack -a "npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts src/cdk/testApp.ts"
